messages.content: Can you make a python script containing a small command line game

content.content:
- request.json
- app
- LICENSE

- code-editing-agent.cabal

tools.description: Read the contents of a given relative file path. Use this when you want to see what's inside a file. Do not use this with directory names.
tools.name: read_file

tools.description: List the contents of a given relative file path. Use this when you want to see what files are in a directory. Only use this with directory names.
tools.name: list_files

tools.description:
Make edits to a text file.
Replaces 'old_str' with 'new_str' in the given file. 'old_str' and 'new_str' MUST be different from each other.
If the file specified with path doesn't exist, it will be created.

old_str.description: Text to search for - must match exactly and must only have one match exactly

tools.name: edit_file
